item.title: Async programming: understanding it from fundamentals
item.description: This was inspired by a short chat I had with a coworker, trying to give a simple, 15 minute explanation of something that took me a decade to wrap my head around due to poor teaching resources online. Async programming in modern “industrial” languages is shrouded in magic, abstractions, and years of atrocious decisions (looking at you, Javascript/Python). Most tutorials start out with “just mark your function async and await it and use these magic incantations and you’re good to go!
